name: tezbridge.github.io
description: tezbridge is the one that allows you to visit the decentralized application of tomorrow in your browser and mobile today

scripts.minify: minify js/build/plugin.js --outFile js/build/plugin.js && minify js/build/app.js --outFile js/build/app.js && minify js/build/tzclient.js --outFile js/build/tzclient.js
scripts.build: npm run b_app && npm run b_plugin && npm run b_tzclient
